name: data analysis notebooks
tagline: My mini-projects on web-scraping, data analysis and visualization.
body: ### Location of National Historic Landmarks **What major U.S. city is the farthest from any landmark?** Wichita, KS is 66.7 miles away from the closest landmark, "Spring Hill Ranch." **Which National Historic Landmark is the most isolated?** "Seal Island Historic District" is 254.6 miles from its closest neighbor, "Dutch Harbor Naval Operating Base and Fort Mears, U.S. Army." For more, see notebook. Implemented in Python, using ScraPy, BeautifulSoup, NumPy, Pandas and Pylab.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
